plants.description: Monstera Deliciosa, also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a popular houseplant with large, fenestrated leaves.
plants.care_instructions: Place the plant in bright, indirect light and water it when the top inch of soil feels dry.

plants.description: Snake Plant, or Sansevieria, is a hardy plant with tall, upright leaves that are often variegated.
plants.care_instructions: Snake plants can tolerate low light conditions and prefer drier soil, so water sparingly.

plants.description: Philodendron Brasil is a trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves that have a vibrant green and yellow variegation.
plants.care_instructions: Provide bright, indirect light and water the plant when the top inch of soil feels dry.

plants.description: Aloe Vera is a succulent known for its medicinal properties and fleshy, gel-filled leaves.

plants.description: Peace Lily, or Spathiphyllum, is a popular flowering plant with glossy green leaves and elegant white blooms.
plants.care_instructions: Keep the plant in indirect light and water it when the soil surface begins to dry.

plants.description: Bonsai Tree is a miniature tree that is meticulously pruned and trained to create a stunning, artistic form.

plants.description: The Succulent Assortment includes a variety of small succulent plants with different shapes, colors, and textures.
